tasks.precommit: deno fmt --check && deno lint && deno check mod.ts && deno check test/*.test.ts && deno test -A
tasks.check: deno fmt --check && deno lint && deno check mod.ts && deno test -A --coverage=cov_profile && echo "Generating coverage" && deno coverage cov_profile --exclude=test/ --lcov --output=cov_profile.lcov
